review: Really enjoyed this classic Caesar Salad. The dressing was spot on!
The salad was decent, though a bit too heavy on the garlic for me.
Belgian Waffles were too sweet for my liking. The texture was good though.
These are the best Belgian Waffles I've ever tasted!
Moules-Frites had a nice balance of flavors but the fries were a bit soggy.
Absolutely loved the Spaghetti Carbonara, creamy and delicious!
The carbonara was rich and creamy, just how I like it.
The Chicken Stir-Fry was good, though it lacked a bit of spice.
The Pad Thai was alright but it wasn't anything special.
The Caesar Salad was great! The dressing was just right.
Nice salad but could use more croutons.
Waffles were okay, could have been fluffier.
Great waffles! Just like how they make them in Belgium.
Really liked the Moules-Frites. Fresh and tasty!
The Spaghetti Carbonara was to die for! A must-try.
Loved the Carbonara. So rich and creamy!
The stir-fry was good but it could use more veggies.
The Pad Thai was decent but I've had better.
